@davydden can you comment on the following packages, which have a non-standard `build_type`?

Unfortunately, `dealii` isn't the only one:
```console
$ grep 'variant(.*build_type' */package.py
benchmark/package.py:    variant('build_type', default='RelWithDebInfo',
cbtf-argonavis/package.py:    variant('build_type', default='None', values=('None'),
cbtf-krell/package.py:    variant('build_type', default='None', values=('None'),
cbtf-lanl/package.py:    variant('build_type', default='None', values=('None'),
cbtf/package.py:    variant('build_type', default='None', values=('None'),
cgal/package.py:    variant('build_type', default='Release',
```
